TextView.android:text:
A scrolling activity from Android official. 
Provide a fab and an expandable toolbar.
		There are several behaviours of the toolbar.
		I re-write it with my BaseActivity.
		AppBarLayout, CollapsingToolbarLayout and Toolbar should be pay attention to. AppBarLayout.LayoutParams has a param 'ScrollFlags', change this can get difference scroll behaviour between toolbar and the full window, it is quite interesting. 'scroll|exitUntilCollapsed|snap' and 'scroll|enterAlwaysCollapsed|snap' are combinations I recommend. The current is the first one.
		CollapsingToolbarLayout.LayoutParams has a param 'CollapseMode', this is another key point.
		See some guides here: http://www.open-open.com/lib/view/open1438265746378.html
